projectGridLines.title: Re-validation of Lightening arrester design for the site and gap identification.
projectGridLines.description:
Re-validation of Lightening arrester design for the site and gap identification.

To re-validate the design of the lightning arresters installed at the site, assess their effectiveness, and identify any gaps or areas for improvement to ensure optimal protection against lightning strikes and electrical surges.

Skill set required to execute the project (Technical)

路        Lightning Protection Systems (LPS)

路        Electrical Circuit Design

Other soft skill competencies required

Learning agility, Creativity, adaptability

Expected learning (in bullet points)

路        Technical Knowledge of Lightning Protection Systems (LPS)

路        Electrical Engineering and Circuit Design
